item.title: Visualization of Board of Director Connections for Analysis in Socially Responsible Investing
item.description: arXiv:2405.20522v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: This project is a collaboration between industry and academia to delve into Finance Social Networks, specifically the Board of Directors of public companies. Knowing the connections between Directors and Executives in different companies can generate powerful stories and meaningful insights on investments. A proof of concept in the form of a Data Visualization tool reveals its strength in investigating corporate governance and sustainability, as well as in the partnership between industry and academic institutions.
item.dc:creator: Alice Da Fonseca, Peter Lake, Ariana Barrenechea
